text:
[Verse]
Night sky shining bright
Stars are taking flight
In the quiet night
Everything feels right

[Verse 2]
Wishing on a plane
Dreams that never fade
In this cosmic game
Our paths gently laid

[Chorus]
Wandering stars above
Guiding us with love
Through skies infinite
Hearts softly ignite

[Verse 3]
Constellations wink
Worlds on the brink
Life a fleeting play
In this astral sway

[Verse 4]
Galaxies afar
We don’t know who we are
Yet in this vast sea
Stars set our spirits free

[Chorus]
Wandering stars above
Guiding us with love
Through skies infinite
Hearts softly ignite
title: Wandering Stars
